title: How to transfer data files via Bluetooth
answer:
Enter Gallery or music player to select any file you want to send, long press the file, in the pop-up menu select **sharing** > **Bluetooth**** **, You can transfer files. 


Open a browser and enter any page, press menu > **Share Web pages **> **Bluetooth **。 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601145019636001.gif)
